thread.title: Katrina Faison
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Katrina Faison

author: Katrina Faison
title: Katrina Faison
text: My husband had his heart set on getting a new Beauty Rest mattress. We started with Kadeem Parham, who was very knowledgeable, and actually listened to our needs and wants, instead of just trying to sell us something. I appreciate this. No wonder is Sales Person of the Month. Then Rodrick Bell took care of us until we were able to sign on the dotted line for our new bed. Great thanks to them both.
